content.question: What is specified about an upcoming trip?

choices.label: The trip will last one week.
The trip is to a foreign country.
The trip helps new students bond with classmates.

content.answer: The trip is to a foreign country.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
